channel.title: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?
channel.description: if your'e planing on reskins or something like that. this is the post. i'm other than playing the mod, planing on just taking materials, models etc over to gmod like iv'e done with the jurassic life pre release.

item.title: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
I HATE. HATE. HATE PEOPLE WHO ARE SAYING “IT’S NEVER GONNA GET RELEASED” ARRGH… Ok… I chilled down… When Bm gets released, I’ma capture all of the footage, get it into one file, make it into 3d (somehow), and watch it Wide screen. And then watch it again. And again. And again.

Read full topic
item.source: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?

item.title: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?
item.dc:creator: Defender
item.description:
klharmon:

why, yes, soon after the release of this mod I plan on celerating my birthday on the moon. I figure by then, mattter to energy teleportation will have been invented making interplanetary travel possible as well as safe.

HAHAHA… I agree! I’m with this guy on this one. So, what are we thinking? Maybe a 2018 release date? That should sound about right.

Read full topic

item.title: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?
item.dc:creator: Urky
item.description:
Im gonna run a freaking Gauntlet of Hard mode of Vanilla Half-Life, Half-Life 2, EP1, EP2, BlueShift, Opposing Force, and BMS at night of release of this Mod,

and to top it all off, some old fashion classic TF to top the cake

item.source: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?

item.title: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?
item.dc:creator: GFreeman515
item.description:
Well beat the mod of course,then (if they both come out before BM)i’ll play O:BM,then GD,then all three on hard mode.Then HL2,EP1,and EP2.Then all three in hard mode.After that,have a real good meal and spend a whole day with my dad(hopfully).
And when I come home,I’ll stand in front over my computer in accomplishment.
(It dosent stop now)Then sit back,have a drink,and listen to the song,The Life And Times - Coat Of Arms.

Read full topic

item.source: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?

item.title: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?
item.dc:creator: Vatz
item.description:
no00dylan:

Well, once BMS is released, I’m sacrificing an infant to Cthulu, then once the editing tools are out, I’m making a mod that’s an alternate universe in which the experiment goes fine, and Gordon goes about his daily life, working at Black Mesa, going home, coming back to Black Mesa, you get the picture. How we REALLY wanted half-life to be.

About fuckin’ time!

Read full topic
item.source: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?

item.title: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?
item.dc:creator: no00dylan
item.description:
Well, once BMS is released, I’m sacrificing an infant to Cthulu, then once the editing tools are out, I’m making a mod that’s an alternate universe in which the experiment goes fine, and Gordon goes about his daily life, working at Black Mesa, going home, coming back to Black Mesa, you get the picture. How we REALLY wanted half-life to be.

item.source: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?

item.title: are you planning on doing something special after the mod gets released?
item.dc:creator: Vatz
item.description:
ulvemann43:

if your’e planing on reskins or something like that. this is the post.

I’m going to play it.
Then I’m going to either learn how to do so (or bitch at friends with the required skills) and put the M4 back in the game, then the HECU zombies and those “solder/security prayer” animations I mentioned in another thread.
Then I’m playing it again to see if there’s any major difference (purple elephants, etc.).
I’m also going to wait patiently for cosplayers to start mimicking Freeman outside Area 51.

Read full topic
